title: Pattern
description: A component pattern in Aihio Design System

name.description: A readable unique identifier for a pattern.

props.description: A list of known properties, including functions, a pattern can have.

attributes.description: A list of known attributes a pattern can have. Attributes are usually string values used in properties, such as functions, and usually dependent on the context.

visibleInDOM.description: Will the attribute be left visible in DOM after parsing?
